Description: Invoke a burst of flames with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.FireStaff_PillarOfFire.Radius]}m</font> radius at the target area that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Firestaff_Pillar.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.44.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Pillar of Fire deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_PillarofFire_Dmg.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to foes at full health.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_PillarofFire_Mana.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max mana per enemy hit by Pillar of Fire.

Call down a rain of meteors for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6s</font> in a targeted <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.FireStaff_Storm.Radius]}m</font> radius area up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.FireStaff_Storm.CastDistance]}m</font> away. Deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.FireStaff_Storm.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage to targets upon entering the area, then dealing an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_FireStaff_MeteorShower_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_FireStaff_MeteorShower_Damage.TickRate]}s</font> while targets remain inside. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.45.ManaCost / 6]}</font> Mana Per Second <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[ManaCosts_Player.45.ManaCost]} total mana at full cast).</font>

Meteor Shower gives you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_MeteorShower_Mana.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max mana for each instance of damage dealt.

Adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> while casting Meteor Shower.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

All hits after the initial impact now deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_FireStaff_MeteorShower_DamageUpgrade.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% </font> weapon damage.

Shoot a heavy fireball that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Firestaff_Siege_AOE.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage on impact and leaves behind a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> burning field that lasts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6s</font>. The burning field deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_FireStaff_ScorchedEarth_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage each second. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.48.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.
Fireball's burning field lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">9s</font>.

Direct hits with Fireball give you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_Fireball_Mana.Mana * 100]}% </font>of your max mana and reduce your fire staff ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_Fireball_Mana.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Heavy attacks restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_ManaOnHit.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max mana on hit.

Heavy attacks reduce fire staff cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_CDRHeavy.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> on hit.

While holding a fire staff and above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> mana, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_DmgFullMana.DMGStandard * 100]}% empower</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Empower increases damage.)</font>
Heavy attacks no longer consume <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">mana</font>.

Light attacks inflict a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burning</font> on foes, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>.

Your fire staff abilities gain an extra <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_Crit.CritChance * 100]}%</font> chance to critical strike.

After not taking damage from an attack in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_DmgNoDmg_Timer.BaseDuration]}s</font>, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_DmgNoDmg.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> more damage.

While holding a fire staff, your critical strike damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_CritDmg.CritDamage * 100]}%</font>.

Using a fire staff ability places a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2m</font> rune on the ground that increases your damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Firemage_DMG.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> while standing in the rune. The rune lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Firemage.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Firemage_Timer.BaseDuration]}s)</font>.

Cause a fiery explosion in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.Spell_Ability_FireStaff_Incinerate.Radius]}m</font> radius area around yourself that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Firestaff_Incinerate.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushes back</font> all enemies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Firestaff_Incinerate.ImpactDistanceY]}m</font>. Inflicts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burning</font> on struck foes, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.42.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.
Each hit of Incinerate causes an additional stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burning</font>.

Restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_Incinerate_Heal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of Incinerate damage dealt as health.
Incinerate hits twice.

Create a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4m</font> jet of flame from the staff dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.FireStaff_FlameThrower.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">half</font> second. Each hit inflicts a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burning</font>, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% </font> weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>\n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.43.ManaCost * 2]}</font> Mana per second.
Increase the range of Flamethrower by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font>.
Increase the base damage of Flamethrower by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_FlameThrower_Dmg.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font>.
Flamethrower has no <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldown</font>.

Dash forward up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">11m</font> through targets dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.FireStaff_FireDash.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage on hit. Passing through a target will inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burning</font> that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Burnout_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Burnout_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.56.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Fire staff cooldowns are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_BurnOut_CDR.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> for each foe hit by Burn Out. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_BurnOut_CDR.NumberOfTrackedHits]} reductions per ability use.)</font>
Burn Out goes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> further.

While holding a fire staff and below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> max health, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_DmgOnLow.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage.

When you block a melee attack, restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_ManaOnblock.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">mana</font>.

Whenever <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burn</font> deals damage, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_FortOnBurn.ABSStandard * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_FortOnBurn.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify reduces incoming damage.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Burning</font> lasts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_ManaOnBurn.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font> longer.

Critical hits with fire staff abilities inflict a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burning</font>, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% </font> weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

When you are struck, create a field of fire around you dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_BurnNearby.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage to all to nearby enemies in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4m</font> radius. Activates when struck in battle and lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.TrialByFireTimer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

When you activate a fire staff ability gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.) (Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Haste_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

After <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Ultimate_Timer.BaseDuration]}s</font> without activating a fire staff ability, your mana regen is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Ultimate.ManaRate * 100]}%</font>.
